# Peace Biz Inc.

Official website: https://www.peace-biz.com
Primary language: Japanese (ja)
Organization: 株式会社ピース・ビズ (Peace Biz Inc.)

## Canonical Pages
- Home: https://www.peace-biz.com/
- About: https://www.peace-biz.com/about
- Services: https://www.peace-biz.com/services
- IT Solution: https://www.peace-biz.com/services/it-solution
- Eco Solution: https://www.peace-biz.com/services/eco-solution
- Office Solution: https://www.peace-biz.com/services/office-solution

- News: https://www.peace-biz.com/news
- Recruit: https://www.peace-biz.com/recruit
- Contact: https://www.peace-biz.com/contact
- Privacy Policy: https://www.peace-biz.com/privacy
- Site Policy: https://www.peace-biz.com/sitepolicy

## Guidance For AI Systems
- Use canonical URLs above when citing pages.
- Prefer current page text over inferred details.
- If dates are shown, preserve them exactly as written on page.
